import { useState } from "react" export default function CreateExercise() { const { exerciseState, setExerciseState } = useState({ username: "", description: "", duration: 0, date: new Date(), users: [] }) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const exercise = { username: exerciseState.username, description: exerciseState.description, duration: exerciseState.duration, date: exerciseState.date } console.log(exercise) window.location = "/" } return (
CreateExercise.component{" "}
